title: How to Spy on Your Competitor’s Keywords (Amazon KDP)
description:
The right keywords can mean the difference between getting your book in front of endless pairs of the right eyeballs…or none at all. Whether you self-publish fiction, nonfiction, or low or medium content, this trick will help you ethically spy on your competitor’s keywords so your book can get discovered and sold on Amazon KDP.

⭐FREE GUIDE: 3 Steps to Publishing Your First Low-Content Book In Less Than a Day: https://rachel-harrison-sund.mykajabi.com/opt-in-c9f26513-e5e5-4365-bcac-8fef82e57bf2?utm_source=youtube&utm_medium=social-media&utm_campaign=3sp&utm_content=196_spy_keywords

0:00- Intro
0:26- What to Know About Keywords—and the Free Tools That Help
1:20- What This Paid Keyword Tool Does (And Why It’s Worth It)
1:44- The Game-Changing Feature That Lets You Spy on Competitors’ Keywords
4:23-How to Confidently Choose the Best Keywords Using Real Data
5:36-Find Out Exactly Which Keywords Your Book Ranks For
